Let the members of the churches in Greater New York hold fast their profession of the faith once delivered to the saints. As you walk in the light, pray, simply trusting in Jesus, your Redeemer. He desires every one 


                                   -102- 

having faith in Him to be a true Helper. "A new commandment I give unto you," He says, "That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another."
